verses.verse: Now<WG1161> I<WG1473> Paul<WG3972> myself<WG846> beseech<WG3870> you<WG5209> by<WG1223> the meekness<WG4236> and<WG2532> gentleness<WG1932> of Christ<WG5547>, who<WG3739> in<WG2596> presence<WG4383> am base<WG3303><WG5011> among<WG1722> you<WG5213>, but<WG1161> being absent<WG548> am bold<WG2292> toward<WG1519> you<WG5209>:

But<WG1161> I beseech<WG1189> you, that I may not<WG3361> be bold<WG2292> when I am present<WG3918> with that confidence<WG4006>, wherewith<WG3739> I think<WG3049> to be bold<WG5111> against<WG1909> some<WG5100>, which<WG3588> think<WG3049> of us<WG2248> as<WG5613> if we walked<WG4043> according<WG2596> to the flesh<WG4561>.
For<WG1063> though we walk<WG4043> in<WG1722> the flesh<WG4561>, we do<WG4754> not<WG3756> war<WG4754> after<WG2596> the flesh<WG4561>:

(For<WG1063> the weapons<WG3696> of our<WG2257> warfare<WG4752> are not<WG3756> carnal<WG4559>, but<WG235> mighty<WG1415> through God<WG2316> to<WG4314> the pulling down<WG2506> of strong holds<WG3794>;)

Casting down<WG2507> imaginations<WG3053>, and<WG2532> every<WG3956> high thing<WG5313> that exalteth itself<WG1869> against<WG2596> the knowledge<WG1108> of God<WG2316>, and<WG2532> bringing into captivity<WG163> every<WG3956> thought<WG3540> to<WG1519> the obedience<WG5218> of Christ<WG5547>;
And<WG2532> having<WG2192> in<WG1722> a readiness<WG2092> to revenge<WG1556> all<WG3956> disobedience<WG3876>, when<WG3752> your<WG5216> obedience<WG5218> is fulfilled<WG4137>.

Do ye look on<WG991> things after<WG2596> the outward appearance<WG4383>? If any man<WG1536> trust<WG3982> to himself<WG1438> that he is<WG1511> Christ's<WG5547>, let him<WG3049> of<WG575> himself<WG1438> think<WG3049> this<WG5124> again<WG3825>, that<WG3754>, as<WG2531> he<WG846> is Christ's<WG5547>, even<WG2532> so<WG3779> are we<WG2249> Christ's<WG5547>.

For<WG1063><WG2532> though<WG1437><WG5037> I should boast<WG2744> somewhat<WG5100> more<WG4055> of<WG4012> our<WG2257> authority<WG1849>, which<WG3739> the Lord<WG2962> hath given<WG1325> us<WG2254> for<WG1519> edification<WG3619>, and<WG2532> not<WG3756> for<WG1519> your<WG5216> destruction<WG2506>, I should<WG153> not<WG3756> be ashamed<WG153>:
That<WG3363> I may<WG1380> not<WG3363> seem<WG1380> as<WG5613> if<WG302> I would terrify<WG1629> you<WG5209> by<WG1223> letters<WG1992>.

For<WG3754> his letters<WG1992><WG3303>, say they<WG5346>, are weighty<WG926> and<WG2532> powerful<WG2478>; but<WG1161> his bodily<WG4983> presence<WG3952> is weak<WG772>, and<WG2532> his speech<WG3056> contemptible<WG1848>.

Let<WG3049> such an one<WG5108> think<WG3049> this<WG5124>, that<WG3754>, such as<WG3634> we are<WG2070> in word<WG3056> by<WG1223> letters<WG1992> when we are absent<WG548>, such<WG5108> will we be also<WG2532> in deed<WG2041> when we are present<WG3918>.

For<WG1063> we dare<WG5111> not<WG3756> make<WG1469> ourselves of the number<WG1469>, or<WG2228> compare<WG4793> ourselves<WG1438> with<WG4793> some<WG5100> that commend<WG4921> themselves<WG1438>: but<WG235> they<WG846> measuring<WG3354> themselves<WG1438> by<WG1722> themselves<WG1438>, and<WG2532> comparing<WG4793> themselves<WG1438> among<WG4793> themselves<WG1438>, are<WG4920> not<WG3756> wise<WG4920>.

But<WG1161> we<WG2249> will<WG2744> not<WG3780> boast<WG2744> of things without<WG1519> our measure<WG280>, but<WG235> according<WG2596> to the measure<WG3358> of the rule<WG2583> which<WG3739> God<WG2316> hath distributed<WG3307> to us<WG2254>, a measure<WG3358> to reach<WG2185> even<WG2532> unto<WG891> you<WG5216>.

For<WG1063> we stretch<WG5239> not<WG3756> ourselves<WG1438> beyond<WG5239> our measure, as<WG5613> though we reached<WG2185> not<WG3361> unto<WG1519> you<WG5209>: for<WG1063> we are come<WG5348> as far as<WG891> to you<WG5216> also<WG2532> in<WG1722> preaching the gospel<WG2098> of Christ<WG5547>:

Not<WG3756> boasting<WG2744> of things without<WG1519> our measure<WG280>, that is, of<WG1722> other men's<WG245> labours<WG2873>; but<WG1161> having<WG2192> hope<WG1680>, when your<WG5216> faith<WG4102> is increased<WG837>, that we shall be enlarged<WG3170> by<WG1722> you<WG5213> according<WG2596> to our<WG2257> rule<WG2583> abundantly<WG1519><WG4050>,

To preach the gospel<WG2097> in<WG1519> the regions beyond<WG5238> you<WG5216>, and not<WG3756> to boast<WG2744> in<WG1722> another man's<WG245> line<WG2583> of<WG1519> things made ready to our hand<WG2092>.
But<WG1161> he that glorieth<WG2744>, let him glory<WG2744> in<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962>.
For<WG1063> not<WG3756> he<WG1565> that commendeth<WG4921> himself<WG1438> is<WG2076> approved<WG1384>, but<WG235> whom<WG3739> the Lord<WG2962> commendeth<WG4921>.
